description:
It`s finally the day of the Locodol Festival. However, Nanako and her friends continue moving at their own pace and enjoy a lively breakfast together. Though Nanako was triumphantly basking in the praises of her friends, a single word from Yui has her agitated again... Despite all their uncertainty and doubts, the Nagarekawa Girls` big moment at the Locodol Festival`s main stage begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé d`être un groupe local
